name: opencode-orchestrator
description: Distributed Cognitive Architecture for OpenCode. Turns simple prompts into specialized multi-agent workflows (Planner, Coder, Reviewer).
author: agnusdei1207

scripts.build:bin:linux-x64: docker compose run --rm dev sh -c 'cargo build --release && cp target/release/orchestrator bin/orchestrator-linux-x64' && shx chmod +x bin/orchestrator-linux-x64
scripts.build:bin:linux-arm64: docker compose run --rm dev sh -c 'rustup target add aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu && apt-get update && apt-get install -y gcc-aarch64-linux-gnu && CARGO_TARGET_AARCH64_UNKNOWN_LINUX_GNU_LINKER=aarch64-linux-gnu-gcc cargo build --release --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu && cp target/aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/orchestrator bin/orchestrator-linux-arm64' && shx chmod +x bin/orchestrator-linux-arm64
scripts.build:bin:win-x64: docker compose run --rm win-builder sh -c 'cargo build --release --target x86_64-pc-windows-gnu && cp target/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/release/orchestrator.exe bin/orchestrator-windows-x64.exe'
scripts.build:bin:win-x64:local: cargo build --release --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc && shx mkdir -p bin && shx cp target/release/orchestrator.exe bin/orchestrator-windows-x64.exe
scripts.build:bin:macos-arm64: cargo build --release --target aarch64-apple-darwin && shx cp target/aarch64-apple-darwin/release/orchestrator bin/orchestrator-macos-arm64 && shx chmod +x bin/orchestrator-macos-arm64
scripts.build:bin:macos-x64: cargo build --release --target x86_64-apple-darwin && shx cp target/x86_64-apple-darwin/release/orchestrator bin/orchestrator-macos-x64 && shx chmod +x bin/orchestrator-macos-x64
scripts.build:bin: npm run build:bin:linux-x64 && npm run build:bin:linux-arm64 && npm run build:bin:win-x64 && npm run build:bin:macos-arm64 && npm run build:bin:macos-x64
scripts.build:js: npx esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --platform=node --format=esm && npx esbuild src/cli.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/cli.js --platform=node --format=esm && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && shx mkdir -p dist/scripts && npx esbuild scripts/postinstall.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/scripts/postinstall.js --platform=node --format=esm && npx esbuild scripts/preuninstall.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/scripts/preuninstall.js --platform=node --format=esm
scripts.build: npm run build:bin && npm run build:js
scripts.release:ship: npm publish --access public && git add -A && git commit -m "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag -a "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" -m "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm run test && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run release:ship
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm run test && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run release:ship
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm run test && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run release:ship
scripts.dev:install: npm run build:js && npm uninstall -g opencode-orchestrator || shx echo 'Not installed' && npm install -g . && echo 'SUCCESS: Installed globally'
scripts.dev:uninstall: npm unlink -g opencode-orchestrator || shx echo 'Not linked' && npm uninstall -g opencode-orchestrator || shx echo 'Not installed' && shx rm -rf $(npm root -g)/opencode-orchestrator && echo 'SUCCESS: Forcefully Uninstalled'
scripts.dev:link: npm run build:js && npm unlink -g opencode-orchestrator || shx echo 'Not linked' && npm unlink || shx echo 'Not linked' && shx rm -rf $(npm root -g)/opencode-orchestrator && npm link && echo 'SUCCESS: Re-linked. Restart OpenCode.'
scripts.dev:unlink: npm unlink -g opencode-orchestrator || shx echo 'Not linked' && npm unlink || shx echo 'Not linked' && shx rm -rf $(npm root -g)/opencode-orchestrator && echo 'SUCCESS: Unlinked and Cleaned'
scripts.dev:build: npm run build:js && echo 'SUCCESS: Built JS (no link change)'
scripts.dev:status: echo '=== Global Link Status ===' && shx ls -l $(npm root -g)/opencode-orchestrator || echo 'Not found'
